works.title: Neon Horizons
works.description: Brand identity for a tech startup exploring the future of AR interfaces

contentBlocks.heading: The Challenge
contentBlocks.body: Neon Horizons needed a brand identity that bridges the gap between cutting-edge AR technology and approachable, human-centered design.

contentBlocks.heading: Design System
contentBlocks.body: The visual language draws from prismatic light refractions — the way AR overlays digital information onto physical space.

contentBlocks.quote: The identity perfectly captures our vision for the future of AR.
contentBlocks.author: Alex Chen, CEO of Neon Horizons
